name: Key Mania
description:
Key Mania

Oh no! You've lost your keys! Move around with your search light to uncover their location. Collect as many keys as possible before time runs out!

Controls
  • WASD - Move
  • Arrow Keys - Move
  • Space - Collect Key
Details

A short game made developed using Unity in 3 hours for the Trijam #129 with the theme "You have to look for it!".

Game design and code by Caleb Vatral

Art assets from Aiconica.net and Quantum Tek
